title: Plugging in Values
text: Plug in the values between $$-3$$ and $$3$$ into the function to get the correct (x,y) pairs.
speech: Plug in the values between  minus 3  and  3  into the function to get the correct (x,y) pairs.
pacedSpeech: Plug in the values between   minus 3
into the function to get the correct (x,y) pairs.
